Name: SerializedFileHeader
Summary: The file header is found at the beginning of an asset file. The header is always using big endian byte order.

Version.Summary: File format version. The number is required for backward compatibility and is normally incremented after the file format has been changed in a major update.

SwapEndianess.Summary: This controls the byte order of the data structure. False is little endian. True is big endian.
SwapEndianess.Remarks: This field is normally set to 0.

MetadataSize.Summary: Size of the metadata section in the file

DataOffset.Summary: Offset to the serialized object data. It starts at the data for the first object.

Unknown22.Summary: An unknown field introduced in version 22.
